content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Explore, build, craft and battle across alien worlds in this physics-based construction sandbox adventure.

Design cars, tanks and planes from a huge library of blocks. Scavenge, craft and buy new parts in order to survive and become the ultimate planetary prospector.

Choose from four game modes: Campaign, Creative, Gauntlet and Multiplayer.

Single Player
Network Players: 1-16
[ 2 GB ] minimum save size

CAMPAIGN
• Grade up through four Corporations: GSO, GeoCorp, Venture & Hawkeye
• Complete Corporation-specific missions
• Fight & scavenge for blocks
• Craft using mined resources

CREATIVE
• Unlimited access to all 400+ blocks
• Build in-world without missions
• Test creations with or without enemies

GAUNTLET
• Build the fastest Tech you can
• Two tracks to choose from
• Beat your previous times

MULTIPLAYER
• PvP battles
• Team matches
• Kill streak rewards
• Text and voice chat

Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

1 player
Network Players 2-16 - Full game requires PlayStation®Plus membership to access online multiplayer
2GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Online Play (Optional)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
